button.Name: Halt
button.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["This button will relay to all connected sessions running combat missions to halt after the next mission."]

button.Name: Resume
button.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["This button will relay to all connected sessions running combat missions to resume running, if they were halted using the Halt button."]

combobox.Name: Combat_AgentLevel
combobox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["Use this to configure what level combat missions you will be running."]

listbox.Name: obj_Combat_AgentList
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["Use this to configure the agent you will be running combat missions for. This only lists agents that you've added to your address book."]

Checkbox.name: Halt
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["This will halt the bot after it completes the current mission."]

combobox.Name: KineticAmmo
combobox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["This configures the ammo the bot will load and shoot when a mission is marked to have enemies weak to this damage type. Note that the list is populated from the current ship's cargo hold and (if docked) your item hangar. If you are using a Corporate Hangar, move some ammo to your item hangar while you configure the bot."]

combobox.Name: ThermalAmmo
combobox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["This configures the ammo the bot will load and shoot when a mission is marked to have enemies weak to this damage type. Note that the list is populated from the current ship's cargo hold and (if docked) your item hangar. If you are using a Corporate Hangar, move some ammo to your item hangar while you configure the bot."]

combobox.Name: EMAmmo
combobox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["This configures the ammo the bot will load and shoot when a mission is marked to have enemies weak to this damage type. Note that the list is populated from the current ship's cargo hold and (if docked) your item hangar. If you are using a Corporate Hangar, move some ammo to your item hangar while you configure the bot."]

combobox.Name: ExplosiveAmmo
combobox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["This configures the ammo the bot will load and shoot when a mission is marked to have enemies weak to this damage type. Note that the list is populated from the current ship's cargo hold and (if docked) your item hangar. If you are using a Corporate Hangar, move some ammo to your item hangar while you configure the bot."]

Checkbox.name: UseSecondary
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["If you are flying a ship that needs to swap between a short-range, higher damage ammo and a long-range, lower damage ammo, select this option. Make sure you have enough cargo space to fit two times the ammo, AND any mission items you need to loot!"]

combobox.Name: KineticAmmo2
combobox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["This configures the long range ammo the bot will load and shoot when a mission is marked to have enemies weak to this damage type. Note that the list is populated from the current ship's cargo hold and (if docked) your item hangar. If you are using a Corporate Hangar, move some ammo to your item hangar while you configure the bot."]

combobox.Name: ThermalAmmo2
combobox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["This configures the long range ammo the bot will load and shoot when a mission is marked to have enemies weak to this damage type. Note that the list is populated from the current ship's cargo hold and (if docked) your item hangar. If you are using a Corporate Hangar, move some ammo to your item hangar while you configure the bot."]

combobox.Name: EMAmmo2
combobox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["This configures the long range ammo the bot will load and shoot when a mission is marked to have enemies weak to this damage type. Note that the list is populated from the current ship's cargo hold and (if docked) your item hangar. If you are using a Corporate Hangar, move some ammo to your item hangar while you configure the bot."]

combobox.Name: ExplosiveAmmo2
combobox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["This configures the long range ammo the bot will load and shoot when a mission is marked to have enemies weak to this damage type. Note that the list is populated from the current ship's cargo hold and (if docked) your item hangar. If you are using a Corporate Hangar, move some ammo to your item hangar while you configure the bot."]

Text.name: AmmoSupplyTitle
Text.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["This configures how many rounds of ammo you will load before a mission."]

Text.name: AmmoSupplyValue
Text.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["This configures how many rounds of ammo you will load before a mission."]

button.Name: AmmoInc1
button.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["This configures how many rounds of ammo you will load before a mission."]

button.Name: AmmoInc10
button.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["This configures how many rounds of ammo you will load before a mission."]

button.Name: AmmoInc100
button.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["This configures how many rounds of ammo you will load before a mission."]

button.Name: AmmoDec100
button.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["This configures how many rounds of ammo you will load before a mission."]

button.Name: AmmoDec10
button.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["This configures how many rounds of ammo you will load before a mission."]

button.Name: AmmoDec1
button.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["This configures how many rounds of ammo you will load before a mission."]

Checkbox.name: RangeLimit
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["If this is checked, only shoot things if they are in range of your weapons. Uncheck it if you want the bot to shoot things even outside range to agro them and get them moving towards you."]

Checkbox.name: DeclineLowSec
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["If this is checked, the bot will decline missions with low-sec warning."]

Checkbox.name: UseDrones
Checkbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["Check this if you'll be using drones to shoot small shit. This tells the bot to make sure to top off drones before running a mission."]

combobox.Name: DroneType
combobox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["This configures the type of drone the bot will top off before a mission."]

listbox.Name: DropoffType
listbox.OnSelect: Script[Tehbot].VariableScope.Mission.Config:SetDropoffType[${This.SelectedItem.Text}] switch ${This.SelectedItem.Text} { case Corporation Hangar UIElement[DropoffSubTypeTitle@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:Show UIElement[DropoffSubType@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:Show break case Personal Hangar UIElement[DropoffSubTypeTitle@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:Hide UIElement[DropoffSubType@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:Hide }
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["Use this field to configure where you would like Tehbot to unload salvage loot."]

Text.name: DropoffSubTypeTitle

listbox.Name: DropoffSubType
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["This field is used to further configure your dropoff type for types that have additional options, like Corporate Hangars."]

Textentry.Name: SalvagePrefix
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["The bot will put this at the front of corporate salvage bookmarks it creates. If it is empty the bot will not create salvage bookmarks. After this text the bot will add the name of the agent you are running missions for and the current eve time. Consider putting something unique here to make sure bookmarks will not conflict with each other if you are running multiple mission runners."]

combobox.Name: MissionConfig
combobox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Tehbot_CombatMissions_Frame@Tehbot_CombatMissions]:SetText["This configures the mission configuration file the bot will use to understand how to run missions. If you make changes to the file externally, you must stop the bot (or set it to halt after the next mission) and start it again to reload the file."]
